title: FS: T210 Old Mill Series 3 Hirsch
author: wcsportscards

posts.post_title: FS: T210 Old Mill Series 3 Hirsch
posts.post_content:
Just got this card back from PSA as being not graded do to it not meeting the minimum size requirements. Looks to be a tad smaller than other T210's I have seen, but this card was purchased, along with others, from the estate of a 90 year old gentleman. I really dont think it was trrimmed, but just a bit shorter, for whatever reason.

Anyway, as I cannot get this card graded, I am selling it raw for $40 dlvd. If you have a raw set, and dont care about grading, this card is perfect for you. Gorgeous color and eye appeal

$40 dlvd

[IMG]http://i1236.photobucket.com/albums/ff450/wcsportscards/001-7_zps99991862.jpg[/IMG][IMG]http://i1236.photobucket.com/albums/ff450/wcsportscards/002-6_zps99b2695c.jpg[/IMG]
Anyone want to give this card a new home?
$40 and this gem can be yours
$40 dlvd on this beauty. Add it to your collection today
